alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 6:32PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, San Bernardino. * WHEN...Until 830 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms along Nipton Road, between Interstate 15 and the town of Nipton. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nipton And Ivanpah Roads. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
